data.app_name: Silent Slayer: Vault of the Vampire
data.description:
Become a vampire slayer on a mythic quest to eliminate these powerful sleeping monsters  — an endeavor undertaken by only the bravest souls. 

In this jumpscare game with elements of horror and puzzle, you must destroy a clan of ancient vampires by carefully disarming their coffins’ defenses with the help of your guide — a mystical book. A pry bar, clippers, and a hook made from a finger bone are among the many tools within reach, but a stake through the heart is the only way to end it. 

Tension builds as you cautiously lift bars, remove nails, and clip wires to find the vampire’s heart. Your silence and precision are key as you avoid awakening the beasts who will drain your life instantly.

**Vicious Vampires** – Make one wrong move and you will have a royal court of deadly vampires on the attack

**Devilish  Distractions** – Maintain unwavering focus to conquer the unsettling diversions that will surely challenge even the strongest slayers
